conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway transformation with consistent geometric depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection; walls have uniform height and thickness with clean corners.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity; all rooms, decks, and utility spaces are correctly placed and scaled.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent furniture matching, including kitchen counters, bathroom fixtures, and specific bed layouts.

visual_clarity.notes: Clear rendering with logical material differentiation; no text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing orientations are represented as open gaps rather than dynamic door leaves.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D transformation that perfectly captures the complex room configuration of the original floor plan.
